comments.text:
SEC_ASN1DecodeItem should fail with SEC_ERROR_EXTRA_INPUT if there is undecoded data remaining in the input buffer.

The code has a disabled assert for this: http://bonsai.mozilla.org/cvsblame.cgi?file=mozilla/security/nss/lib/util/secasn1d.c&rev=1.39&mark=2814-2827#2814 , but in theory any places that legitimately wanted to allow it could ignore that error result.

Bug 352932 is an example of a specific instance of this problem.
comments.author: mattm@chromium.org
comments.creator: mattm@chromium.org
comments.raw_text:
SEC_ASN1DecodeItem should fail with SEC_ERROR_EXTRA_INPUT if there is undecoded data remaining in the input buffer.

The code has a disabled assert for this: http://bonsai.mozilla.org/cvsblame.cgi?file=mozilla/security/nss/lib/util/secasn1d.c&rev=1.39&mark=2814-2827#2814 , but in theory any places that legitimately wanted to allow it could ignore that error result.

Bug 352932 is an example of a specific instance of this problem.
